span.span: Read Coronavirus (COVID-19) updates here: Albuquerque Bilingual Academy will be closed between March 13-April 6, 2020

Albuquerque Bilingual Academy is a FREE K-8 bilingual charter school. A 18:1 teacher student ratio provides an excellent, personalized, family learning environment that can quickly identify and correct learning issues. We offer FREE lunch and bus transportation. Our multi-cultural, diverse enrollment prepares our students for today’s increasingly technology driven, bilingual world.

The MISSION of Albuquerque Bilingual Academy ensures that culturally and linguistically diverse students thrive in an academic, family centered, developmentally seamless continuum of learning where high expectations, PRIDE, respect and empowerment meet grade level proficiency.

div.a: Kindergarten Promotion May 19, @7500 La Morada NW 87120 - Cafeteria , 5:30 PM — 6:30 PM
8th Grade Promotion May 21, @7500 La Morada NW 87120 - Cafeteria , 5:30 PM — 6:30 PM

div.blockquote: This is the Albuquerque Bilingual Academy Mariachi Club, pic taken after their performance at the opening of the 2019 Independent Charter School Symposium at Hotel Albuquerque pic.twitter.com/c9XULD5lm6 — Albuquerque Bilingual Academy (@ABQBilingual) November 18, 2019

div.p: We will continue to add Continuous Learning tools on this page

Below you will find a link to our supplemental resource page. Students may access these resources from home during the three-week emergency closure. However, please note that each resource is web-based and online learning cannot be made mandatory.

A message from PED: The Public Education Department is committed to keeping our school leaders and communities up to date about Coronavirus in New Mexico (COVID-19). NMPED and New Mexico Department of Health (NMDOH) are working together on a daily basis to share the most current information as well as to consult on protocols, procedures and best practices.
Please confirm by January 31, 2020 if your child is returning next fall for the 2020-2021 SY.
Students that submit letters of Intent after 01/31/2020 will be subject to entry into the ABA enrollment lottery with all new incoming students that wish to enroll for SY 2020-2021.

strong.em: Important dates to remember for RETURNING STUDENTS:

ul.li: ABA Returning Students: Letters Of Intent to Return to ABA are due back to the office no later than 3:00 pm on Friday January 31, 2020.

li.strong: Registration for returning students (K-8) will be held February 3-7, 2020. Returning students must have a ‘letter of intent to return’ on file for the upcoming (20-21) year. Registration hours will be 9 am-2:30 pm during the registration window at our Unser location only!

strong.em: Important dates to remember for NEW INCOMING STUDENTS:

ul.li: Letters of Intent for “NEW STUDENTS for SY 2020-2021” will be accepted starting February 3, 2020.
Open house for Selected New Students in K-8 grades will be February 6 & 7, 2020 from 9 am-12 pm. Tours are available upon request.

div.p: Please visit the 'ADMISSIONS' page to learn of important enrollment dates and to complete the online 'Letter of Intent' form that is available in both Spanish and English.
